author: arunhep
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags 
 
## MC 2017
 
   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics peak scenario** : [94X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v0) as [93X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/93X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/94X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v0/93X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v3): 
      * update of Jet Probability calibration for b-tagging : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3231.html
      * update of HCAL channel quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3259.html
      * update of Pixel channel Quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3244.html
      * update of ECAL TPG tags

   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics scenario** : [94X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v0) as [93X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/93X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/94X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v0/93X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v3): 
      * update of Jet Probability calibration for b-tagging : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3231.html
      * update of HCAL channel quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3259.html
      * update of Pixel channel Quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3244.html
      * update of ECAL TPG tags

   * **PhaseI 2017 realistic scenario** : [94X_mc2017_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_mc2017_realistic_v1) as [94X_mc2017_realistic_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_mc2017_realistic_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/94X_mc2017_realistic_v1/94X_mc2017_realistic_v0): 
      * update of Pixel dynamic inefficiency for 2017 : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3257.html
      * update of Jet Probability calibration for b-tagging : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3231.html
      * update of HCAL channel quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3259.html
      * update of Pixel channel Quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3244.html
      * update of ECAL TPG tags

## Upgrade

   * **PhaseI 2018 cosmics scenario** : [94X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v0) as [93X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/93X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v0/93X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v2): 
      * update of Jet Probability calibration for b-tagging : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3231.html
      * update of Pixel channel Quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3244.html
      * update of ECAL TPG tags

   * **PhaseI 2018 design scenario** : [94X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v1) as [94X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v1/94X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v0): 
      * update of Jet Probability calibration for b-tagging : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3231.html

   * **PhaseI 2018 realistic scenario** : [94X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1) as [94X_upgrade2018_realistic_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018_realistic_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1/94X_upgrade2018_realistic_v0): 
      * update of Jet Probability calibration for b-tagging : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3231.html
      * update of ECAL TPG tags
      * update of Pixel dynamic inefficiency for 2017 : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3257.html
      * update of Pixel channel Quality : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3244.html
title: [GT Updates] PixelDynamicInEff, PixelQuality, HCALQuality, ECALTPG, JetProbability BTag Calib
